author: Special Correspondent
text:
Large number of tourists riding on coracles at Hogenakkal on Sunday. Photo: N. Bashkaran

A large number of tourists from different parts of Tamil Nadu and Karnakata thronged Hogenakkal on Sunday.

The men, women and children who arrived here in four-wheelers and two-wheelers from the early morning hours took bath in the falls. They later enjoyed coracle ride in River Cauvery.

Security

Even though there was meagre inflow in River Cauvery, the police had made elaborate security arrangements to ensure the safety of the tourists. They also cautioned the tourists through public address system on the presence of the anti-social elements and the danger spots in the river and falls.

The personnel of Fire and Rescue Services were present in good number and ensured that the coracle riders adopted all safety measures including wearing life jackets.
title: Tourists throng Hogenakkal
